entry.value: select d.data_id, d.table_name, d.event_type, d.row_data, d.pk_data, d.old_data, d.create_time, d.trigger_hist_id, d.channel_id, d.transaction_id, d.source_node_id from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data d left outer join $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data_event e on d.data_id=e.data_id where d.channel_id=? and d.data_id > ? and e.data_id is null order by data_id asc
select distinct(data_id) from $[sym.sync.table.prefix]_data_event where data_id > ? order by data_id asc
